title: LongCaptioning: Unlocking the Power of Long Caption Generation in Large Multimodal Models
author: Hongchen Wei (Wuhan University), Zhihong Tan (Wuhan University), Yaosi Hu (Hong Kong Polytechnic University), Changwen Chen (Hong Kong Polytechnic University), Zhenzhong Chen (Wuhan University), ...
relevance_why: The methodologies for generating long captions from videos could be adapted for audio and speech tasks, potentially enhancing automated audio captioning systems, which is aligned with Dr. Liu's research interests.
background: The paper addresses the challenge of generating long and informative captions for videos using Large Multimodal Models (LMMs), which typically struggle with lengthy outputs.
contribution: This paper introduces LongCaption-Agent to synthesize long-caption data, enabling models to generate captions exceeding 1,000 words.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous approaches to video captioning primarily focused on short captions, limiting their application in contexts requiring detailed descriptions.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work incorporates a novel three-stage caption synthesis framework, using frame-level and clip-level information to enhance detail and coherence in generated captions.

key_innovation: The LongCaption-Agent framework uniquely combines multi-level video descriptions to produce comprehensive long video captions, leveraging existing LMM capabilities.
real_world_impact: By improving long caption generation, this work could enhance accessibility for visually impaired users and aid in content summarization for diverse applications.
limitations: No specific limitations are mentioned regarding the framework or dataset construction.

new_terms.Long Multimodal Models (LMMs): **Long Multimodal Models** are advanced models that can process and understand data from multiple modalities such as text, image, and video.
new_terms.LongCaption-Agent: **LongCaption-Agent** is a proposed framework for generating long video captions by aggregating details from multiple video segments.

open_sourcing: The LongCaption-10K dataset and code will be released post-publication.
